resources.string: Get a steal at the Art League\'s Patrons\' Show
Swipe to the left for an overview of the app.

Art Thief makes it easy to build and submit a list of your favorite art from the Art League\'s Patrons\' Show. When your name is selected during the Patron\'s Show drawing, the highest ranked artwork from the list you submitted via Art Thief will be automatically selected as your chosen piece.
Buy a ticket to the Patrons\' Show. That insures you get a cut of the loot.
Review and rate the art. Assign stars to all the pieces that you like with 5 stars being the art you love.
Use the "Compare" feature or drag and drop the artworks with a given star rating to get your art in order with your favorite pieces at the top of your list.
Enter the code name that\'s associated with your ticket and submit your list. You can resubmit your list at any time.
i n t e r a c t i v e
Please feel free to reach out to us at:\nsupport@zurka.com
Use that camera on your device to place a virtual copy of the art on any wall.
